title: Reborn Little Girl Won’t Give Up - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manga   Age Progression   Child Protagonist   Cute Protagonist   Death of Loved Ones   Depictions of Cruelty   Doting Older Siblings   Doting Parents   Familial Love   Female Protagonist   Heartwarming   Kidnappings   Magic   Reincarnation
author: Kaya   カヤ
description:
When I woke up, I had been reborn as a baby. My mother passed away and I was neglected by my father. Even though I was born in a Marquis family, my life started on HARD MODE, but I won’t be discouraged. I will eat well, sleep well, move much, get whatever I can get and live happily.

This is a story of a little girl with the power to create barriers making everyone become happy.>
